alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; La Crosse; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:23AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Buffalo, La Crosse and southern Trempealeau Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fountain City to near Rushford. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arcadia around 435 AM CDT. Galesville around 440 AM CDT. La Crosse Airport around 450 AM CDT. Onalaska, Holmen and French Island around 455 AM CDT. West Salem around 500 AM CDT. Bangor around 505 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Czechville, Merrick State Park, Camp Decorah, Dodge, Beach Corners, Perrot State Park, Stevenstown, and Rockland. This includes Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
